attributes.action: EU Referendum triggering a General Election 2016.
attributes.additional_details:
While the politicians bicker over who's going to be top dog let us unite to care about our countries. 

A small amount of people hold more than half the wealth of our Great UK. This includes bankers and politicians.  There is an interest for them to say the problem is immigration and not a wealth divide.

Let us not become isolated Little Briton(LB) or a former 'prosperous economy'.
attributes.background: Its our last chance to stay in the EU by democratically electing a PM that promises NOT to invoke article 50 of The Lisbon Treaty but also appropriately taxes the richest to spend on our poorest. Nobody loses face as it is the democratic will of the public with a 2nd chance to change minds.
